programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o cps2pch_ftable.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 ipch = 8.02
; Use Table #1, a table of frequency multipliers. icps cps2pch ipch, -1
print icps endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1: a table of frequency multipliers. ; Creates a 10-note scale of unequal divisions. f 1 0 16 -2 1 1.1 1.2 1.3 1.4 1.6 1.7 1.8 1.9
; Play Instrument #1 for one second. i 1 0 1 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
